item.title: Time Your Meals, Tune Your Metabolism
item.description: New research reveals how meal timing and microbial rhythms could reshape metabolic care with targeted gut-based therapies. Medscape Medical News

item.title: cUTI Care Just Got Easier: Use This 4-Step Plan
item.description: A new 4-step algorithm helps tailor cUTI treatment while promoting earlier switch to oral antibiotics. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Preeclampsia Prediction Moving Closer to Reality
item.description: Current methods of risk assessment and prevention are falling short. Medscape Medical News
